channel.title: Add and Removed :(
channel.description: Well I added a new shop and put in the wanneshop and changed the item prices for the items in the shop. So after I compiled, I ran my server but then it gave me this error. [code]Exception in thread "main" java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 17 at ItemHandler.loadItemList(ItemHandler.java:305) at ItemHandler.<init>(ItemHandler.java:195) at server.main(server.java:117) [/code] I tried fixing it many times but I don't know how to fix it. Please tell me how to fix this problem.

item.title: Add and Removed :(
item.dc:creator: @gangsta_tony gangsta tony
item.description:
@gangsta_tony wrote:

^^ I checked, there aren’t any spaces.

Read full topic

item.cfg is gonna be hard to search for spaces. go to line 117, 195, and 305 and check if there is a space in any of the lines.

There isn’t any spaces in shops.cfg, it has to be somewhere else. I edited client.java and item.cfg.

@gangsta_tony wrote:

Well I added a new shop and put in the wanneshop and changed the item prices for the items in the shop. So after I compiled, I ran my server but then it gave me this error. Exception in thread "main" java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 17 at ItemHandler.loadItemList(ItemHandler.java:305) at ItemHandler.<init>(ItemHandler.java:195) at server.main(server.java:117)
I tried fixing it many times but I don’t know how to fix it. Please tell me how to fix this problem.
